dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 5,'fmMM/DD/YYYY') criteria_date, :LOC locs FROM DUAL

SELECT cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, loc1.location_name org_port, loc2.location_name dest_port, loc3.location_name carrier, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value),'MM/DD/YY'),'fmMM/DD/YYYY') cut_date, NVL(con.max_num_teu,0) || 'TEU / ' || NVL(con.max_num_feu,0) || 'FEU' capacity, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value fo_loc FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN consol con ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = con.charter_voyage_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc3.location_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((con.allocated_num_teu IS NULL OR con.allocated_num_teu = 0) AND (con.allocated_num_feu IS NULL OR con.allocated_num_feu = 0)) AND (LENGTH(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value)) = 8 AND TO_DATE(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value),'MM/DD/YY') <= SYSDATE + 5) AND (:LOC IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC IS NULL AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) ORDER BY TO_DATE(TRIM(cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value),'MM/DD/YY') DESC
